submitFail: Failed to submit vote! Please wait a few minutes before trying again...
sessionExpired: Your session has expired! Please log in again to submit your vote.
informationalHeader: If you are confident that any of the candidates are not going to do well in the position they are running for, select <1>No Confidence.</1> If you would rather not vote for any of the candidates for a certain position for any other reason, select <3>Abstain</3>.
